comment.author: 52583849@N04
comment._content: Albatros D.Va - note round fuselage and offset radiator.

comment.author: 86669976@N05
comment._content:
More precisely, Albatros D.V 4476/17  (most probably).
If you notice the aileron control cables are visible running in front of cockpit from the upper wing.

comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: This picture is in the (autobiography) of Ernst Udet where it is captioned as 'Leader of the fighter-escadrille 37 in Flandern 1917' (translated from a Dutch language edition of this biography published in the Netherlands in 1943).
